subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
Variant of {{l|mul|遲}}. {{Han simp|遲|f=犀|t=𡱝}}. {{lang|mul|𡱝}} is a variant of {{lang|mul|犀}}.

The modern Japanese usage is of reform ([[shinjitai]]) nature.

subSections.title: Readings
Derived terms
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|おそ|yomi=kun}}
{{ll|ja|語幹|Stem form}} of classical adjective {{ja-l||おそし|ososhi}},<ref name=DJR>{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> modern {{m|ja|おそい|tr=osoi||[[late]]}}. Attested in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}''.
